long_description: Made of a continuous loop of stainless steel, the roomy yet light Nite Ize BigRing Steel keychain deftly corrals more than the average number of keys, with eight #.5-sized S-Biners in two colors. Use one of the S-Biners to attach the BigRing to a belt loop, purse strap, or zipper pull, or to hook to a second ring. S-Biners attach and detach quickly, making it easy to share keys with friends, valets, babysitters or for taking a single key with you when you're out for a run or ride.
short_description: Made of a continuous loop of stainless steel, the roomy yet light Nite Ize BigRing Steel keychain deftly corrals more than the average number of keys, with eight #.5-sized S-Biners in two colors.
